parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF 11240002), which is a strong indicator of electoral propaganda, as it's a mandatory identifier for campaign materials in Romania.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions Maria Gabriela Horga, a PNL candidate for Senator in Giurgiu.  It also mentions other PNL affiliated individuals, such as Florin Nidelea (PNL mayor of Clejani) and Toma Petcu (PNL president of Giurgiu County Council). This directly fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, the content is clearly intended to reach a wide audience, not just a select few. This satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The post highlights Horga's achievements and her intention to represent local interests in the Senate.  The repeated mention of her candidacy and the PNL affiliation strongly suggests the objective is to influence voters to support her. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c". The phrase "Când voi fi #senator" is a clear call to action, aiming to influence the vote positively for Horga.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>While the post mentions some factual information about local developments, its primary focus is not objective journalism. The promotional tone, emphasis on Horga's candidacy, and the inclusion of other PNL members make it primarily a campaign advertisement rather than a journalistic piece.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a structured presentation of Horga's accomplishments and her political platform, designed to promote her candidacy.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>439880395442886</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda under Romanian law. It contains a CMF number, explicitly refers to a candidate (Maria Gabriela Horga) and other PNL affiliated individuals, targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook campaign, and has the clear objective of influencing voters to support Horga's candidacy. The content is presented in a promotional manner, not as objective journalism.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>Maria Gabriela Horga</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PNL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Forges Policy, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID 439880395442886) cu conținut electoral, care promovează candidatura Mariei Gabrielei Horga la Senat din partea PNL, folosind imagini și text cu scopul clar de a influența votul în favoarea acesteia și a altor membri PNL, inclusiv menționarea realizărilor sale și a intenției de a reprezenta interesele locale în Senat, toate acestea fiind elemente constitutive ale propagandei electorale interzise după încheierea perioadei de campanie.  Prezența numărului CMF 11240002 confirmă natura electorală a postării.  Efectul electoral este evident, având în vedere conținutul explicit de promovare a candidatei și a partidului.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
